text: Li Jie (李誡; 1065–1110) was an ancient Chinese architect and writer. He lived in the Northern Song dynasty. He wrote the Yingzao Fashi. The Yingzao Fashi was a book about technical architecture and craftmanship. == References == == Other websites == * Yingzao Fashi: Twelfth-Century Chinese Building Manual by Qinghua Guo Category:Chinese writers Category:11th-century Chinese artists Category:12th-century Chinese artists Category:Architects Category:1065 births Category:1110 deaths Category:People from Henan Category:11th-century Chinese writers
title: Li Jie (Song dynasty)
